dict.acceptation: 友情，友谊；友善的关系；友善，好意；

sent.orig: Harbor's tender friendship, the friendship between the breeze filled Zhengfan.
sent.trans: 友谊的港湾温情脉脉，友谊的清风灌满征帆。

sent.orig: What is friendship? Friendship and our life are closed, is a part of feelings.
sent.trans: 友谊是什么？友谊是和我们生活紧密相连的、不可缺少的感情的一部分。

sent.orig: ASB and China, is not only a special friendship is the symbol of peace and friendship.
sent.trans: ASB和中国有着不解之缘，不仅是友谊更是友好和平的象征。

sent.orig: More friendship-and friendship-closer and closerto our hearts.
sent.trans: 圣诞快乐，好友，我们的情谊，更加深厚；我们的心灵，愈加相印。

sent.orig: Friendship often ends in love, but love, in friendship-never.
sent.trans: 友谊常以爱情而结束；而爱情从不能以友谊而告终。
